banner.title: Global selling on multi-channels and multi-markets

globalSelling.title: Global selling pains on multiple channels and markets
globalSelling.performance: Performance tracking across different channels & markets

selling.title: Selling cross border process
selling.created: Created for fueling the rapid growth of e-commerce brands on a global scale.
selling.iChibaOne: IChiba solution facilitates seamless expansion and adaptability through our support for multiple channels, warehouses, languages, and currencies.

boost.title: Boost your international sales with specialized capabilities designed to help you exceed your goals

how.title: How we assist businesses selling cross border?
how.subtitle: For merchants selling cross-border, we provide robust all-in-one ecommerce solution

multiMarket.title: Multi-market, multi-channel management
content: Handle orders from multiple channels, online to offline, on a single location.
Deliver highly personalized shopping experiences with customized product suggestions in each market.
Localized browsing: Content and site structure have been translated to ensure that they are adequately fitted to the target area.

smooth.title: Smooth switch between multi-language, multi-currencies
smooth.auto: Auto-translate your products into some popularly available languages.
smooth.automatically: Automatically convert to the currency of the selected country. Sellers can choose update market exchange rates immediately or fix the desired price.

multi.title: Multi warehouse in multi countries
multi.automatically: Automatically collect orders from multiple warehouses based on the seller's order distribution strategy.
multi.standar: Standardize order placement and processing across warehouses to increase efficiency.

handle.title: Handle multi-channel fulfillment on global scale
handle.receive: Receive orders placed on your multiple sales channels and then pick, pack ship to your international customers.
handle.realTime: Real-time monitoring and analysis to prevent stockouts or overstock situations.

brand.title: Brand Recognition
brand.content: Provide marketing automation service to build brand recognition in a new market where the brand is not well known.

seo.title: SEO and Marketing
seo.content: Consult SEO and marketing strategies for each channel and market.

interational.title: International shipping without hassle
content: AI powerful technology automatically suggests the best carrier rates, based on the nature of the product and the target delivery destination.
Maintain full visibility of order status with real-time updates from all couriers on a single dashboard.

duty.title: Duty and tax calculation
content: Remove the guesswork from international trade by determining your shipment's Harmonised Code, locating essential customs paperwork, and more.
Allow consumers to view and prepay all customs and taxes at checkout to avoid unpleasant surprises upon delivery.
Automatically calculate and charge the correct tax exactly on every transaction, based on the product you sell, the buyers' location, and more.

customs.title: Customs clearance
content: Get goods cleared quickly and reliably even in markets considered to be difficult in challenging regions with various dedicated teams.
Continuously update shipment during customs declaration processing in real-time on a united platform.
Utilize cutting-edge customs clearance technologies and EDI capabilities to ensure consistent and compliant trade activity.

global.title: Global selling is just a piece of cake

all.title: All-excutive supporting tools
all.content: Take advantage of our optimized operations. We can help you manage your international logistics, including cross-border forwarding, customs, returns, and more.

scale.title: Scale Effortlessly
scale.content: Capture new sales opportunities in formerly inaccessible markets and position your business for growth.

support.title: 24/7/365 support service
support.content: Get the most accessible and comprehensive support service, available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

weAre.heading: We’ve helped hundreds of brands expand to global markets!
weAre.content: Our awesome customers have benefited from IChiba's hyper-scalability to connect to some game-changing tools. Check out some examples below – and get inspired about what you could achieve.

whatAre.title: What are the right products/services for you?

items.title: Ship4P
items.content: Shipping management platform that centralizes multiple carriers to manage, reducing costs, and simplifying shipment management.

items.title: Cross-Border Forwarding
items.content: Managing imports and exports has never been easier - reduce customs clearance time by up to 40%, ensure 100% SLA, and maximize customer satisfaction.

items.title: Commerce Layer
items.content: Sell everywhere, manage orders in one place. Maximize effectiveness with better automation, data and intelligence.

items.title: Order fulfillment service
items.content: Deliver modern logistics and customized eCommerce order fulfillment solutions to B2B & B2C clients with powerful onboarding, management & reporting features.
